title:
Noise Covariances Identification by MDM: Weighting, Recursion, and
  Implementation
authors: Oliver Kost, Jindrch Dunik, Ondrej Straka
abstract:
The problem of noise covariance matrix identification of stochastic linear
time-varying state-space models is addressed. The measurement difference method
(MDM) is generalized to time-varying dimensions of the measurement and control.
Three MDM identification techniques that differ in weighting used in the
underlying least squares method are proposed. The techniques differ in estimate
quality and computational complexity. In addition, recursive forms are designed
for two techniques. The performance of the proposed techniques is analyzed
using two numerical examples. The implementation of techniques is enclosed with
the paper.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Signal Processing
